msbt.message: Listen, forget what I said about leavin', .I sorta let talk me into stayin'Reckon this means we get to go on bein' neighbors.

Ah, !Wanted to tell you I decided not to move off the island.I know I mighta seemed dead set on leavin' when last we talked, but I kept ruminatin' on it afterwards.Then I guess I had a change of heart, after havin' my ear chewed off by , ! So there you go! Hope you won't mind stayin' neighbors. Gahaha!
So I got some news for you, Turns out I ain't movin' after all. Reckon I got convinced to stick around by .Long and short of it is that y'ain't seen the last of this old cuss yet!

Remember when I told you I might be movin'? Well, here's the thing I sorta ended up changin' my mind. The how and why ain't important. Just got my heart strings pulled a bit.But hey! This means we can go on bein' neighbors, !
